alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 28 at 1:26PM PST until December 31 at 4:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM WEDNESDAY TO 4 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, with localized amounts up to 56 inches above 8000 feet possible. Areas of southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with local gusts to 55 mph in the San Bernardino Mountains. * WHERE...Above 5,000 feet in the San Bernardino County Mountains, Riverside County Mountains and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...1 AM Wednesday to 4 AM Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for significant reductions in visibility at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
